item.title: Heat Classes
item.description: In this document we will be detailing the parameters around the H.E.A.T. Training system. Index Offense Area of Effect Infantry Light Anti-Tank Support Heavy Anti-Tank Supressive Quartermaster Defence Stationary Defense Mobile Defense Passive Defense Scout Radar Scavenger Demolitionist Mechanized Exo-suits Armored Personnel Carriers All Terrain Vehicles The system is broken down into 5 Tiers.

item.title: Custom Formatting Features
item.description: Custom formatting features implemented for use in the Wiki.

item.title: H.E.A.T. Resources
item.description: Challenges for HEAT HEAT Certification Rules 101st “Hell” Battalion Basic Certification Classes Guide H.E.A.T. Certification Request Template **Callsign:**[Ping Yourself] **Certification Requested: **[Tier + Class] **Availability:** [Time] Reason for seeking training: [Give us some lore; bring a little RP into here] Remember to Ping yourself The availability time should be formatted in UTC +2 or using Discord date picker .

item.title: Welcome
item.description: This is the WIKI of the 101st “Hell” Battalion, the most active Helldivers 2 Millsim Server. Start here: newbie-overview At the current time the Wiki is not finished and might still contain some mistakes if you find anything that doesn’t look right please message one of the Current maintainers of the Wiki This WIKI serves as an overview for all the different resources you can find on the server.

item.title: Departure Course
item.description: This will be a short course or Reminder on how to create and manage Departure Notices. If you have any Questions after this please feel free to message your Commanding Officer and if they are not reachable the Person above them.

item.title: External Resources
item.description: Battalion Roster You can find most information about Company’s Platoons Squads and individual members in the Battalion Roster. Battalion Steam Community post SCO Leadership Course Tech Department Detailed Data Sheet Enemy Weak Points and Damage Numbers docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/e/2PACX-1vRBrOIXQIYaOBNw8v9zRX4Qj8BDP0xaMTAzGhL1Tv6QxOU43RXM_ByDHwk4xw_HRjsCXhpif-jUlQAn/pubhtml 101st Tech Document: Armor Penetration and Weak Points explained docs.google.com/document/d/1uBE9SS0gcKGBTMJQ02LuG0LV79A2OtrJipnDjtRZVSk/edit 101st Tech Document: Health and Armor docs.google.com/document/d/12fqZmm1_1GoQFq-aabzwHPujTtprDQ4ua5nC_ck-mPU/edit .
